title: Tatakau Shisho to Koisuru Bakudan
original_name: 戦う司書と恋する爆弾
sinopse: In a world where dead people turn into books and are stored in the Bantorra Library where anyone who reads a book can learn their past. Bantorra Library is maintained by Armed Librarians who wield psychic powers and their enemy is a religious society known as Sindeki Kyoudan.
